resources.string: You must give permission to use your camera in order to use the application
Tell us how did the prediction go!
You just got your hands on a detectacar. Turn on your lights to detect a car!

The prediction is being made using a neural network based on a ResNet architecture, together with a bounding box detector in form of YOLO. The prediction is yet to be improved, so we count on your feedback to make it work better!
